comments.body:
No, this was re-introduced to resolve issues regarding the npm module called `buffer`.

I tested this and it seems declaration order does affect auto imports (albeit somewhat inconsistently).

The aliases will be re-introduced soon-ish anyway.

I think, above, you could replace these lines:
```ts
const BuffType: typeof Buffer;
...
export { BuffType as Buffer };
```
With this (since `globalThis` is considered a namespace):
```ts
export import Buffer = globalThis.Buffer;
```

That way both the value and type for `Buffer` are exported from the `"buffer"` module.
